text: The Little Spreewald Maiden is an American silent film produced by Kalem Company and directed by Sidney Olcott with him and Gene Gauntier in the leading roles. ==Cast== * Gene Gauntier - Frieda, the Spreewald Maiden * Sidney Olcott - Hans, her sweetheart ==Production notes== The film is shot in 1910, at Raddush Spreewald, along the river Spree in Germany and in New York. ==External links== * * The Little Spreewald Maiden website dedicated to Sidney Olcott Category:1910 films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American silent short films Category:Films set in Germany Category:Films shot in Germany Category:Films directed by Sidney Olcott Category:1910 short films Category:1910 drama films Category:American black- and-white films
title: The Little Spreewald Maiden
